request.description: the endpoint is meant to update the current state of a test step within a test run. The request payload includes the `user_id` (ID of the user updating the step), `test_run_history_id` (ID of the test run), and `step_id` (ID of the test step being updated). The new state of the step can be included in the request body as well.

Endpoint is designed to retrieve the number of newly created test cases based on certain conditions. It can be used to build dashboards.
This endpoint return a list of failed test cases with details such as test case ID, test case name, test run ID, test run name, and failure count.
Returns a list of defect cases for the selected test runs within the specified date range.
This endpoint is used to mark a test case as completed. The test case is identified by its unique ID, and the status of the test case is updated to 'Completed'.
This endpoint allows you to retrieve a list of test cases that have been modified within a specific time range.
The "createQrUser" endpoint is typically used to record the user's data associated with a QR code.
The "QR login" endpoint is typically used to send a confirmation code to the user's email address for validating their registration
